subject: Sexual Health
title: The Depo Shot
description: Learn The Depo Shot in one minute.

hook.text: One injection every three months can prevent pregnancy. No pills, no patches, no daily routine.

buildup.text: Depo-Provera uses a high dose of progestin that suppresses ovulation for about 12 weeks per shot.

discovery.text: The shot is 94% effective with typical use and over 99% effective with perfect timing.

twist.text: Bone density loss is a known side effect of long-term use, though it usually reverses after stopping.

climax.text: For people who need discreet, low-maintenance contraception, the shot offers a powerful option.

punchline.text: Four shots a year. Simple and effective.

quiz.question: How often is the Depo-Provera shot administered?
